Name: Phoenix Drive
Desc:
All of the flame flowing within the caster is unleashed for a brief duration, bombarding a single target in front, to be followed by a final, focused blow.
Attack varies based on the Fire Essence summoned.
Required Skill: Orbital Flame IV Lv. 30 or above

H.Old:
MP Cost: 300. For 15 sec, enhances Orbital Flame
[Fire Lion]: Attacks up to 8 enemies at 315% damage 2 times with 3 attacking flames. When multiple flames attack a single monster, starting with the second flame, decreases Final Damage by 50%, and increases damage against normal monsters by 40%
[Flame Fox]: Attacks up to 8 enemies at 450% damage 2 times with 4 attacking flames. When multiple flames attack a single monster, starting with the second flame, decreases Final Damage by -50%
Cooldown: 90 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 300. Enhances Orbital Flame I for 15 sec.
Fire Lion: Fires 3 flames that attack up to 8 enemies at 315% Damage 2 times. If multiple flames attack a single enemy, Final Damage -50% for each subsequent flame after the first one. Normal Monster Damage +40%
Flame Fox: Fires 4 flames that attack up to 8 enemies at 450% Damage 2 times. If multiple flames attack a single enemy, Final Damage -50% for each subsequent flame after the first one.
Cooldown: 90 sec.
